name: Sleigh'd By The Bells
description:
You just got the call. Christmas is in danger.

The Evil SINR (Santa Is Not Real) organization is about to destroy Christmas. They've sent out their  hunter bots and personal units to take down anyone that still believes in Santa. You'll have to use your armed flying Sleigh Car to take down SINR's evil robots and attack ships!

Upgrade. Die. Save Christmas. Repeat.
Your Sleigh Car is fully upgradable, visit the shop to gain strength again SINR! You can collect powerups that can be improved too, from an instant ring of explosions to temporary slow-motion.

Controls

Move - AWSD / Arrow Keys / Left stick / D-Pad

Dash - Shift Key / Left Trigger

Pause - P Key / Escape / Start Button

Credits

Game by SlyBalto

Music by Nitrosparxx and Zapslat.com

Santa Hats by Aquaduck Studio

This game is a part of the Jame Gam 2021 Christmas Game Jam!
